title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the slope

1 point is earned for the equation of tangent line

At t=3,  dy dx = y ′ (3) x ′ (3) = 3 e −3 −1 =− 3 e 3 =−0.149 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5811@

An equation for the line tangent to the path at the point (5, 4) is y−4=− 3 e 3 (x−5) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@413D@ .

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for "yes" with explanation

1 point is earned for t = 2

1 point is earned for integral for x(2)

1 point is earned for x-coordinate

Since dx dt >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B8E@ for 0<t<2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A6B@ and dx dt <0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B8A@ for t>2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiDaiabg6da+iaaikdaaaa@38B1@ , the particle is farthest to the right at t = 2. The x-coordinate of the position is x(2)=5+ ∫ 3 2 ( 6 t −3 ) 1/3 dt=5.791 or 5.792 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@542D@

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the behavior of x

1 point is earned for the behavior of y

Since lim t→∞ dx dt = ( −3 ) 1/3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47C7@ and lim t→∞ dy dt =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F7@ , the particle will continue moving farther to the left while approaching a horizontal asymptote.
